name: Mantidrake
immunities: type associated with the dragon head color

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The mantidrake doesn’t provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy’s reach.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The mantidrake has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mantidrake makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spikes
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (4d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dragon Breath (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: The mantidrake exhales its breath based on its dragon head color. Each creature in the area affected must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) damage on a failed save, of half as much on a successful one.
